message.body: Sofie i am feeling soo sick. I had the worst night ever. Cant make it class. I am now sending him an e mail. Hope i wont seem like a 16 year old girl. Can u tell him too? Will send my pape too.
Are u ok lady?
Of course ill talk to him Are you sure there isn't anything I can do into help. If you feel better in an hour or so you should still come in even it's late. I think joe will appreciate it.

I have been throwing out all night long - no alcohol no nothing. I had stomachache all day long yesterday but did not thought that it was a big deal. Eah part of my body hurts right now. I am sending him a mail now but I dont want to sound stupid like a girl who just wants to skip course. What should i tell him
Tell him the truth. I will talk to him too. Don't worry. Take care of yourself. This stuff happens

I ve sent the e mail and my paper. Please let me know if he does not support the idea of not coming to class bc i am feeling sick. But i have took so muh medicines, god i have never felt this much pain in my stomach othe than my period. I was crying all night long. Thanks btw. Let mr know when you talk to him.
Of course. Aw this sounds horrible. Did u call a doctor?ill tell him h texted me at Like six in the morning when it started

What did he say? I am trying to sleep since your last message but noo! How this calling a doctor process works? There is no one home. Thanks by the way about the six in the morning : ) what did i miss?
He didn't say anything. Sky didn't come either so he was more concerned about her
You missed conversation and assignment
Why not me? Does not he like me :( no one likes me anyways. Omg I am giving one of my sickness speeches. Azeem is telling me about the assigment on FB. It sounds big!
I went out with Daniel to somewhere close. He picked me up with his car. I slept all day so i think i m feeling better
How'd it go
We are still out.
Nice!!!
Good have a good time
I think Daniel is awesome, but remember to listen to Yourself, see how you feel .. It's not easy
I hope we will oh and yhey have not slept with maria.
Haha
Whatever
It's ok even if he did sleep with her
Maria does seem to be particularly into him in that way (like I wouldn't want u to burn bridges) and he is def into u
Enjoy yourself
Haha yeah he told me that he had this some kind crush to her but it ended in time
She's awesome means he has good taste. You should be flattered
I got a Brazilian wax today
Everything is gone!!!
I haven't done that in years!!
Woow how much?
A lot but it was good
She did my butt!$
Hahaha you go girl!
